column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////On my recent trip to Chicago
column2: I had to get in my share of the famous Chicago Pizza. Everyone I know told me I needed to go to Lou Malanati's. So on my 2nd day in Chicago
column3: I waited in line. The hostess told us our wait was 45 mins to an hour
column4: so we decided to go for a walk
column6: we would get seated with in 20. So my group and I rushed back
column7: all sweaty and stuff. Good thing
column8: the work out increased our appetite because I was ready to down some deep dish pizza.
